member.name: T:ModTool.Interface.IModHandler
member.summary: Interface to be implemented by mods that wish to receive OnLoaded and OnUnloaded calls. Non-UnityEngine.Object types that implement this interface will be instantiated when the Mod loads.

member.name: M:ModTool.Interface.IModHandler.OnLoaded
member.summary: Called when the Mod is loaded.

member.name: M:ModTool.Interface.IModHandler.OnUnloaded
member.summary: Called when the Mod is unloaded.
